title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits beep when SWT.MULTI is selected
description: In the ControlExampleText, there's an unexpected beep when choosing SWT.MULTI. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: Upon selecting SWT.MULTI, a beep occurs. Subsequently, clicking other buttons also triggers the bell sound.
EB: Selecting SWT.MULTI should not result in any audible feedback such as a beep.
SR:
1. Open ControlExampleText.
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe the beep sound upon selection.
4. Click other buttons to reproduce the bell sound.
